sections.title: About Me
sections.html:
I'm a software engineer with 5+ years of experience and a bachelor's degree in Computer Science. I'm also an open-source collaborator, either through my own or other people's projects.

I'm that kind of person that gets bored easily, so I'm constantly studying new approaches, technologies, and paradigms to turn the tables... The dynamics of programming is what drives me!

Oh, of course... Ghost is my son, a beautiful Akita.

sections.title: Techstack
sections.html:
I'm currently developing back-end services with NodeJS (mainly Express), front-end apps with Vue/React and mobile apps with React Native. Also, I've got a lot of experience with Java, and more specifically, Spring Boot framework.

It's worth mentioning that because of some work done in DevOps space I've got a very good understanding of CI/CD tools, Docker and Kubernetes.

If you want to see more of my techstack, please, click here.

experiences.html: Responsible for developing back-end and front-end solutions (mainly in NodeJS and React Web/Native). Has DevOps assignments (CI, Docker and Kubernetes).

projects.title: Vue Twemoji Picker
projects.html: A developer friendly, easy integrable, evergreen and performatic emoji picker (with some batteries) using the Twitter emoji arts (Twemojis). Developed with Vue, for Vue.

projects.title: VVARBOT
projects.html: Twitter bot which uses the social network streaming API for automated tweets and replies. Developed in NodeJS.

projects.title: Opa
projects.html: Opa is an open-source XMPP chat client for the Web (SSR) entirely built on top of Vue, NuxtJS and ElementUI.
